newsitem.title: BELARUS: Lukashenko says will attend OSCE Lisbon summit.
newsitem.headline: Lukashenko says will attend OSCE Lisbon summit.

text.p: Belarussian President Alexander Lukashenko said on Tuesday he would attend next week's summit of the Organisation for Security and Cooperation in Europe (OSCE) in Lisbon.
"I will definitely go to Lisbon. There is no need not to go. I will even speak in sixth place," Lukashenko told Reuters.
The OSCE refused to send observers to a referendum organised by Lukashenko on Sunday to extend his powers, which his opponents say are dictatorial.
